SERVICES

Let us look after you. No one does lymphatic drainage treatments better than us! Our incredible lymphatic system is a gift from the creator. We simply need to turn it into an ally. Choose a treatment that will help you look and feel your best!
DISCOVER MORE

Benefits of Brazilian Lymphatic Drainage After Surgery

REDUCE SWELLING & BRUISING

It removes stagnant areas of lymph and cellular waste products and reduces inflammation in the affected areas, which can drastically decrease swelling and help bruises to heal more quickly. Reduction in inflammation can help with discomfort felt by many patients after surgery.

Prevention of fibrosis (formation of scar tissue)

After a cosmetic procedure, the body has to create new connective tissue to heal the wounds created by surgery. When a lot of scarring happens after surgery, the tissue thickens and becomes tight. Scarring decreases naturally over time, but some scarring can be permanent and can affect the final appearance of the area after healing.

Faster healing time

Patients heal more quickly when inflammation is reduced. The lymph system is also important to the body’s immune response and improving the movement of lymph can reduce the risk of infection after surgery.

LOOK GOOD. FEEL BETTER.

our values

RESPECT
Every person that enters our studio will be treated with respect, kindness, and care. We greet each and every person with eye contact and with confidence and compassion.
EDUCATION
Our role is to not only achieve positive results, but also empower each of our clients with knowledge about their bodies and what they can do to enhance their own well-being.
RESULTS
We are motivated to achieve extraordinary, measurable results for our clients, ourselves, and each other. We readily acknowledge those results no matter how incremental.
CLIENT FOCUSED
Our goal is to create long-term therapeutic relationships with clients as a part of their choice to live healthier lives.
LISTENING
Health issues and concerns are common, but everyone has unique symptoms that cause them distress or concern.
